title: Pixel 4 XL - Dead right after upgrade to Android 11 yesterday. Won't boot unless plugged in.
content: Never ran out of power on my XL 4 since I bought it Nov. 2019. A charge would last 1-1.5 days. Upgraded to Android 11 last night. Cannot fire it up unless it's plugged in. Pretty annoyed right now seeing how much of this has been happening for a long time with no resolution.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
